activity.classes
Class ReviewImagesActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      activity.classes.FActivity
          activity.classes.ReviewImagesActivity

public class ReviewImagesActivity
extends FActivity

This activity displays a list of available tags in the spinner at the top, and once selected displays a list of conditions that are currently stored in the database with the corresponding tag.

Author:
mbessett
